pages.title: Item Bowls
pages.text: $(italic)There is one item you always forget when caving, such as a piece of chalk to mark the way back to the surface. Placed in this decorative Item Bowl should serve as a good reminder.$()$(br2)The Item Bowl presents a single item stack floating above it.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: It comes in both a Polished Basalt and Polished Calcite variant.
